Title: Verify Select Orders Option Navigation
Description: 1. Open Import Orders drawer\n2. Click on 'Select Orders' option\n3. Verify navigation to Order Manager
Preconditions: - User is logged in\n- Empty loads are created\n- Job file is open
Expected Result: User is redirected to Order Manager screen where orders can be selected and added to job file

Title: Verify Import Orders File Upload
Description:
1. Open Import Orders drawer
2. Click on 'Import Orders' option
3. Upload valid order file
4. Verify orders are imported
5. Verify orders are registered in Order Manager
Preconditions: - User is logged in\n- Empty loads are created\n- Valid order file is available
Expected Result: Orders are successfully imported to job file and registered in Order Manager. No errors displayed.

Title: Verify Duplicate Order Detection Warning
Description: 1. Import orders via file upload\n2. Attempt to upload same orders again\n3. Verify warning popup appears
Preconditions: - Orders already exist in Order Manager\n- User has access to Import Orders drawer
Expected Result: Warning popup displays: 'These orders are already in the system and will be omitted from the upload'. Duplicate orders are not imported.

Title: Verify Clear Orders - Yes Option
Description:
1. Import orders to job file
2. Click Clear Orders button
3. Select 'Yes' option
4. Verify orders removed from both job and Order Manager
Preconditions: - Orders are imported in job file\n- Clear Orders button is visible
Expected Result: Orders are removed from both job file and Order Manager. Confirmation message displayed.

Title: Verify Clear Orders - No Option
Description:
1. Import orders to job file
2. Click Clear Orders button
3. Select 'No' option
4. Verify orders removed from job only
5. Verify orders remain in Order Manager
Preconditions: - Orders are imported in job file\n- Clear Orders button is visible
Expected Result: Orders are removed from job file only. Orders remain visible in Order Manager.

Title: Verify Move Orders Button Enable
Description:
1. Import orders to job file
2. Select one or more orders
3. Verify Move Orders button is enabled
4. Deselect orders
5. Verify button is disabled
Preconditions: - Orders are available in Import Orders section\n- Multiple orders exist
Expected Result: Move Orders button is enabled only when one or more orders are selected. Button is disabled when no selection.

Title: Verify Orders Moved to Selected Load
Description:
1. Select multiple orders
2. Click Move Orders button
3. Select target load from popup
4. Verify orders transferred to selected load
Preconditions: - Multiple orders are available\n- Multiple loads exist\n- Move Orders button is enabled
Expected Result: Orders are successfully moved to selected load. Orders appear in load management screen under selected load.

Title: Verify Automatic Location-Based Grouping
Description:
1. Move orders with different locations to a load
2. Verify orders are grouped by location
3. Add order with existing location
4. Verify order goes to correct location group
Preconditions: - Orders have location data\n- Target load exists
Expected Result: Orders are automatically grouped by location. New orders with existing locations are added to correct group. Sequence follows order selection.

Title: Verify Expandable Activities Show Order IDs
Description: 1. Navigate to Load Management screen\n2. Expand activity card\n3. Verify order IDs are displayed as chips
Preconditions: - Orders are assigned to loads\n- Activities exist in load
Expected Result: Activity card expands to show all order IDs as removable chips. Order IDs are clearly visible.

Title: Verify Removable Order Chips Functionality
Description:
1. Expand activity in Load Management
2. Click remove icon on order chip
3. Verify order removed from activity
4. Verify order appears in Import Orders section
Preconditions: - Orders are assigned to activities\n- Activity card is expanded
Expected Result: Order chip is removed from activity. Order returns to Import Orders section (All Orders).
